name: DemoOnFly
description:
A chrome extension to build and check demo on fly for eCommerce/ERP modules/addons, developed by Webkullians(Webkul Store Link: https://store.webkul.com)
An addition to it, you can also build demo for FREE ODOO Addons, placed on ODOO Store(https://www.odoo.com/apps)
author: Mohit Chandra(mohit@webkul.com)
